page.title: 11FARMING
page.content:
LOCAL FARMS
Of the twelve farms in our area that are still inhabited, all but two are farmed extensively and provide the income necessary for the occupiers.
The land provides rough grazing for cattle and sheep, meadows for hay-making, and most of the farmers keep additional horses and fowls.
Everyone we spoke to said they liked living there because of the pleasant scenery and the peace and quiet, but very few had time for any leisure activities. Those who had walked, listened to music or tinkered with their vehicles.
